name: SpringOfRussia
description:
This game is about a girl in Russia in 1898-ish. She faces marriage and underlying social change in her life. Your choices can decide her life.

This game contains 12 different named endings. Some though are under the same name, have minor differences between each other.

This game uses oil paintings at that time. All original paintings are uploaded in github. The address is in 'About' in the game.

This game now only has Chinese version. The writer knows nothing about Russian, so Russian in this game is completely machine translated by deepl. This is a story set in 19th century Russia and is told in Chinese. The writer doesn't know why she is writing this description in English. 

DEBUGGING
